dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...so this plane, it just turned around, right? Like, back to Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so this plane, it just turned around, right? Like, back to Almaty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The plane, flying from Almaty to Cam Ranh (Vietnam), was forced to return to the departure airport after several hours in the air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It just turned around? After how long in the air, exactly? Sounds a bit more dramatic than 'just'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It just turned around? After how long in the air, exactly? Sounds a bit more dramatic than 'just'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, aviation services said, like, three hours twenty-eight minutes. Then landed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, aviation services said, like, three hours twenty-eight minutes. Then landed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to aviation services, the Air Astana aircraft spent 3 hours 28 minutes in flight, after which it landed in Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Three hours? That's not 'just turning around,' man. What was the real reason? They always say 'technical'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Three hours? That's not 'just turning around,' man. What was the real reason? They always say 'technical'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the info spreading online said technical malfunction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the info spreading online said technical malfunction.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The information spread online that the incident was caused by a technical malfunction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Online says that? What did the actual airline, Air Astana, say about their 'technical malfunction'?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Online says that? What did the actual airline, Air Astana, say about their 'technical malfunction'?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, they, um, quote, 'made an emergency landing at Almaty airport due to a technical issue.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, they, um, quote, 'made an emergency landing at Almaty airport due to a technical issue.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 28, the Air Astana aircraft, operating the night flight KC193 on the route Almaty - Nha Trang, made an emergency landing at Almaty airport due to a technical issue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A 'technical issue.' Very, very specific. So everyone was just stuck, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A 'technical issue.' Very, very specific. So everyone was just stuck, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, they said passengers got hot meals, drinks, and, um, 'if desired,' a hotel transfer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, they said passengers got hot meals, drinks, and, um, 'if desired,' a hotel transfer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While waiting for the flight in the terminal, passengers were provided with hot meals and drinks and, if desired, a transfer and accommodation at a hotel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'If desired'? Who wouldn't desire a hotel after three hours in the air and a forced landing, honestly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'If desired'? Who wouldn't desire a hotel after three hours in the air and a forced landing, honestly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Eventually, they sent everyone on another plane at 7:15 AM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eventually, they sent everyone on another plane at seven fifteen a m.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Passengers were sent to their destination on another aircraft at 07:15 AM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Another plane. Right. Hey, wasn't this the same airline that had that other emergency landing? In Baku?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Another plane. Right. Hey, wasn't this the same airline that had that other emergency landing? In Baku?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, an Air Astana aircraft was forced to make an emergency landing at Heydar Aliyev International Airport in Baku.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but that one, uh, that was for a passenger's health, though. Not a plane issue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but that one, uh, that was for a passenger's health, though. Not a plane issue.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The unscheduled landing was due to a sudden deterioration in the health of one of the passengers on board.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sure, a 'passenger's health.' Or maybe their planes just, like, can't stay up in the air.
